feed.title: Channel-Port aux Basques - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING , Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 12:30 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: ESE 26 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Blowing snow late this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 in the Wreckhouse area late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow changing to rain or drizzle near midnight then to snow before morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 in the Wreckhouse area this evening. Wind becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023
